title: #243: Surviving Bill Cosby - Tamara Green, Part 1
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa interview Tamara Green one of the first survivors to speak out and waive anonymity about being drugged and sexually assaulted by Bill Cosby.

Tamara explains the impact of Cosby's behaviour on her, the reality of reporting sexual abuse, and the secondary trauma you experience when others don't believe you and she places on record her special thanks to one man in particular for publicly outing Bill Cosby for raping women.


#Survivor

#SexualViolentPredator
